Subject: Re: The Battle Ends, and the Carnage Begins
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Double 
Punch/Manterror/Injector/Bumblebee/Ares:



Dark One saw the battle down below, and dived, firing off twenty-five rapid 
laser blasts down at Torca, in the process avoiding autogun and EMP fire.

---

Breakdown took all the blasts in his chest, laughing.  "That's the best 
you've got?" he yelled, raising his grenade launcher with one arm.  He 
launched the grenade off at Torca, a sonic blaster appearing in his left hand 
from subspace.  He raised that arm, firing off an arc of sonic energy from 
the blaster at Torca's abdomen.

---

Two missiles exploded against the black tank's armor, leaving large dents.  
The cannon raised, and three fire balls launched off at Sky Lynx.

---

Hiss caught an EMP blast to the knee, and let out a curse, and returned fire 
with fusion blasts, blowing apart an EMP cannon, autogun fire sending him 
flipping to his back.

---

Scavenger jumped to his right, a few of the rapid shots from Ratchet hitting 
his left thigh.  He got to a knee, firing off 25 shells at Ratchet.

---

Sixshot took the rapid fifteen shots from Ratchet and burst out into 
laughter.  "UTTERLY PATHETIC!" he yelled, his turret moving slightly, firing 
off another blast from his cannon in tank mode at Ratchet, this time the 
blast aimed at his sternum.

---

Demon Wulf looked over to where the flying Alliance members and the two tanks 
were busy fighting.  He raised his sword, the blade launching out of the hilt 
as a missile, heading for Sideswipe.

---

Double Punch laughed as two missiles struck the ground nowhere near him.  The 
third though struck, and sent a little big of shrapnel into his left heel.  
But he wasn't bleeding thanks to his armor.  He raised both pinchers, firing 
off two energy-signature seeking missiles at Orion, keeping silent so he 
wouldn't help give away his own position.

---

Manterror laughed, and raised both arms.  He launched off a single ion disk, 
intercepting the incoming missile, covering his face to protect it from 
shrapnel.  "Die." he said to himself with a vicious smile, firing off 5 ion 
disks at Sky Lynx.  Two from one arm, three from the other.

---

Injector dodged the missile, but the twelve rapid blasts connected with his 
right shoulder, sending him flying backwards until he regained balance in the 
air.  He moved his right shoulder, though with much pain.  He cursed, and 
fired down six stinger missiles and ten rapid optic blasts at Sideswipe.  
Three missiles from each launcher.

---

Bumblebee dodged the rapid blasts but caught the missile straight in the 
chest and was sent flipping backwards.  He regained balance, and flew full 
force,  spinning through the air on purpose, firing off 25 rapid optic blasts 
and four stinger missiles at Sideswipe, two missiles from each launcher.

---

Ares saw the battle, and swerved his turret.  He fired off eight shots at Sky 
Lynx, four shots from two of his cannons.  He moved his turret further and 
fired off eight shots at Orion, four shots from the two remaining cannons.
